column4: I am trying to run www.pbskids.org for my kids.. but it requires flash player and shockwave... I am having a hard time installing them.  Could some one instruct me in how to do this?
flash is in multiverse (the bot will send you instructions).  Adobe does not provide shockwave for linux, so the only way to get it is to install firefox with flash in wine
WoW I love ubuntu.. Thank you.
